original_text: Then the three disciples said to Jesus, ‘The teachers of God's Law say that God's prophet Elijah must return first, before the Messiah comes. Why do they say this?’
korean_text: 제자들이 물어 이르되 그러면 어찌하여 서기관들이 엘리야가 먼저 와야 하리라 하나이까

sentences.original_text: Then the three disciples said to Jesus
that God's prophet Elijah must return first
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 선지자 엘리야가 먼저 돌아와야 한다고
